title: FREE DOWNLOAD: Little Ant's big plan (Eng, Xhosa, Zulu & 8 more)
text:
FREE DOWNLOAD: Little Ant's big plan (Eng, Xhosa, Zulu & 8 more)

This is a story about a little ant with a big plan, and how his love for reading saved the day. Read and download this story in multiple languages here.

Little Ant loved to read all day, he'd read and read the day away.

Read on to see what he learns from the books he read.

Created by Candice Dingwall (writer), Steven McKimmie (illustrator) and Telri Stoop (designer).

This story is brought to you by Book Dash, a local organisation that gathers creative volunteers to create new African storybooks that anyone can freely print, translate and distribute.

Sign up to our newsletter to be notified of new bedtime stories for kids.
